Escucha sin anuncios y sin esperas con iVoox Premium Today, we are joined by Dr. Janea Wright, a licensed Naturopath Doctor (ND) with the Saskatchewan Association of Naturopathic Practitioners and the Canadian Association of Naturopathic Doctors. Dr. Wright owns her own practice and works 1:1 with patients in person and virtually. She now offers online programs to obtain greater reach and help empower more women to take their health back into their own hands. During this episode, we dive into the world of naturopathic medicine, focusing on Janea's inspiring journey and why she became a Naturopathic Doctor. Join us as we explore the core aspects of her practice, the role of Doctors, and the valuable benefits they naturopathy or seeking to deepen your understanding, this episode has something for everyone.
